item.title: CVE-2024-35707|2024-08-02T03:14:53.942Z -- team%20heateor -- heateor%20social%20login
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Heateor Heateor Social Login allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Heateor Social Login: from n/a through 1.1.32.
